Falters at times: The claim falters at times because it falsely attributes the video to several famous bakeries across India.
Lack enough support: The claim lacks enough support as it only provides a video and messages from social media users without any further evidence or verification.
Problematic assumption: The claim makes a problematic assumption that the video is about the quality of food at Pista House and Karachi Bakery based on a message posted with the video.
Exist alternative explanation: There is an alternative explanation provided in the claim that the video is actually from Treats Bakery, Karachi and not Pista House, Hyderabad.
Contradict fact: The claim contradicts the fact that the video is falsely attributed to several famous bakeries across India.
Exaggerate: There is no clear evidence of exaggeration in the claim.
Understate: There is no clear evidence of understatement in the claim.
